title: How to Make Rosemary Castile Shampoo

steps.headline: Add the essential oil drops to the Castile soap.
Mix well by shaking in the bottle with the lid on.
Allow to stand for 2 days.
steps.description: Turn the bottle and leave up the other way at least once a day to assist with dispersion of the rosemary essential oil throughout the soap.

steps.headline: Now it's ready to use.
steps.description: Give it a good shake each time you use it.

tyn: Shampoo bottle (you can re-use one that is finished or buy a special one)
